definition: AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt
variant of 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]

sentences.english: AIDS and cancer are maladies that afflict humanity.
sentences.chinese: 爱滋病和癌症是折磨人类的疾病。

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is becoming the commonest AIDS-defining illness.
sentences.chinese: 结核病成为最常见的爱滋病界定疾病。

sentences.english: There is a TV show about AIDS on right now. ; (
sentences.chinese: 电视正播映一个有关爱滋病的节目。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, conservative power-broker Roy Cohn (Al Pacino), who gave Joe the offer of promotion, is dying of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 同时，提拔乔的保守权力掮客洛伊正为爱滋病所苦。

sentences.english: He found telltale signs of AIDS on her tongue and around her genitals.
sentences.chinese: 他在她的舌头上和生殖器周围找到爱滋病的病征。

sentences.english: The conference will focus on how to prevent the spread of AIDs throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议将重点解决如何防止爱滋病在全世界传布。

sentences.english: HIV infections were reported to DH in the fourth quarter of 2006.
sentences.chinese: 本季度卫生署共收到九十八个爱滋病病毒感染个案。

sentences.english: It is a non-profit organization fighting AIDS and poverty in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个对抗非洲爱滋病和贫穷问题的非营利组织。

sentences.english: The red ribbon is meant to signify concern for AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 红丝带是用来表示对爱滋病的关怀。

sentences.english: HIV is passed on by sex without condoms.
sentences.chinese: 爱滋病是经由不用安全套的性接触传染。

sentences.english: And that is what we are seeing in this case.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们现在在爱滋病病毒演变中所看到的情况”。

sentences.english: Biochemists are doing research into the causes of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 生化学家正在作研究探讨爱滋病的成因。

sentences.english: Dasey had AIDS and, one day, I was going to lose her.
sentences.chinese: 德茜娜患了爱滋病，终有一天我将会失去她。

sentences.english: On the other hand , studies also indicate its moderate anti-HTV activity.
sentences.chinese: 有资料表明金银花对抗爱滋病显中等活性。

sentences.english: The 12th International AIDS Conference was held in June in Geneva, Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 第十二届国际爱滋病会议六月在瑞士日内瓦举行。

sentences.english: HIV can be traced back to villages along the Congo River in the 1950's.
sentences.chinese: 爱滋病最早的记录停留在1950年代的刚果河流域。

definition: variant of 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
AIDS (loanword)/also written 愛滋病|爱滋病
